channel.title: Random error,
channel.description:
Umm i been running me server for like a week, and i go in and edit like 1 value, (I don't remember what thats why im posting). It compiles all fine thats why I don't get the error its this tho..
[code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: " 1000" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(NumberFormatException. java:48) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:447) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:497) at ShopHandler.loadShops(ShopHandler.java:131) at ShopHandler.<init>(ShopHandler.java:31) at server.main(server.java:31)
Connection accepted from 127.0.0.1: 49255. Client type: high memory version UserId: 92744601 Yoshi112 is signing onto server. Yoshi112: character file not found. Yoshi112: moreinfo file not found. LOADED: 3 Connection accepted from 127.0.0.1: 49256. Client type: high memory version UserId: 92744601 Yoshi112 is signing onto server. [client-3-Yoshi112]: Yoshi112 is already online. Connection accepted from 127.0.0.1: 49257. Client type: high memory version UserId: 92744601 Yoshi112 is signing onto server. [client-4-Yoshi112]: Yoshi112 is already online. Connection accepted from 127.0.0.1: 49258. Client type: high memory version UserId: 92744601 [/code]
And it just keeps saying your accou t is allready logged in. It goes in the first time to black screen, then it goes connection loss, and all the times u try from then on with same user name it says acc alredy logged in..
Main thing is can anyone decipher this for me,
Thing is i havent done anything in shophandler :\ [code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: " 1000" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(NumberFormatException. java:48) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:447) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:497) at ShopHandler.loadShops(ShopHandler.java:131) at ShopHandler.<init>(ShopHandler.java:31) at server.main(server.java:31)[/code]
Thanks,,.

item.title: Random error,
item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura
item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

You fucked up somewhere in shops.cfg.

Read full topic

item.title: Random error,
item.dc:creator: @Phatt Phatt
item.description:
@Phatt wrote:

^^ not not gona do anything…

Read full topic

item.title: Random error,
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Use tabs instead of spaces while editing .cfg files, and make sure every ID has an ammount of it after.

Read full topic

item.title: Random error,
item.dc:creator: @jester01445 jester01445
item.description:
@jester01445 wrote:

that happened to me once i just deleted that character and in the EGUI.Java i changed teh ip’s to my server and it worked try it

Read full topic

item.title: Random error,
item.dc:creator: @rune_mate99 rune mate99
item.description:
@rune_mate99 wrote:

Umm i been running me server for like a week, and i go in and edit like 1 value, (I don’t remember what thats why im posting). It compiles all fine thats why I don’t get the error its this tho…

[code]Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "
1000"
at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(NumberFormatException.
java:48)
at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:447)
at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:497)
at ShopHandler.loadShops(ShopHandler.java:131)
at ShopHandler.(ShopHandler.java:31)
at server.main(server.java:31)

Connection accepted from 127.0.0.1: 49255.
Client type: high memory version
UserId: 92744601
Yoshi112 is signing onto server.
Yoshi112: character file not found.
Yoshi112: moreinfo file not found.
LOADED: 3
Connection accepted from 127.0.0.1: 49256.
Client type: high memory version
UserId: 92744601
Yoshi112 is signing onto server.
[client-3-Yoshi112]: Yoshi112 is already online.
Connection accepted from 127.0.0.1: 49257.
Client type: high memory version
UserId: 92744601
Yoshi112 is signing onto server.
[client-4-Yoshi112]: Yoshi112 is already online.
Connection accepted from 127.0.0.1: 49258.
Client type: high memory version
UserId: 92744601
[/code]

And it just keeps saying your accou t is allready logged in. It goes in the first time to black screen, then it goes connection loss, and all the times u try from then on with same user name it says acc alredy logged in…

Main thing is can anyone decipher this for me,

Thing is i havent done anything in shophandler :\

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: " 1000" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(NumberFormatException. java:48) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:447) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:497) at ShopHandler.loadShops(ShopHandler.java:131) at ShopHandler.<init>(ShopHandler.java:31) at server.main(server.java:31)
